long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortless LinkedIn Copper Integration – Now with AI Insights!

Simplify your CRM workflow with LinkMatch, the perfect tool for Copper LinkedIn integration. Save time, enhance productivity, and manage your contacts directly within LinkedIn.

Key Features:
- Save Profiles Easily: Add LinkedIn profiles (people or organizations) directly to Copper CRM with just one click.
- Automatic Recognition: Instantly see which LinkedIn profiles are already in your Copper database – no manual checks needed.
- Stay in LinkedIn: View and edit Copper CRM profile details right inside LinkedIn, without switching tabs.
- LinkedIn Message Sync: Automatically sync your LinkedIn messages with Copper for seamless communication tracking.
- NEW – AI Insights: Leverage AI-powered recommendations to identify top prospects, prioritize follow-ups, and close deals faster.

This LinkedIn Copper integration is designed to help sales professionals and teams stay efficient and focused on building meaningful connections.


Browser permissions description for compliance with Chrome WebStore policies:

- notifications: show notifications when profile action is completed
- https://*.linkedin.com/* - to be able to make requests to linkedin.com
- https://*.xing.com/* - to be able to make requests to Xing
- https://*.copper.com/* - to be able to make requests to Copper API
- https://ali-userassets-production.s3.amazonaws.com/* - for loading Copper images
- https://*.linkmatch.net/* - API calls to LinkMatch(application server)
